name: 战术狂想1(Chimera of Tactics 1)
developer: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
publisher: 自由愉悦小黄猫(Free pleasure little yellow cat)
description: Gameplay: detection, bombard, head-on attack, launch missiles, intercepting the missile, boarding, seizing enemy ships, skills of roles(such as make enemy missiles U-turn), offensive warfare, defensive warfare, breakout warfare ... ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 256 MB available space
